text.text: Target your audience based on their interests. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur magna aliqua.

In 2015, the former-producing silver-cobalt Castle Mine, Beaver Mine and Violet Mine were transferred (from Granada Gold Mine Inc.) to a dormant shell company in exchange for shares that were distributed to Granada shareholders. Subsequent to 2015, the size of the Castle property has been enlarged through staking and acquisitions to 78 square km.
In 2020, the company acquired the Temiskaming Testing Laboratory (TTL) bulk processing facility in the Town of Cobalt, Ontario.
In 2021, the company acquired 15 properties in Quebec and one in Ontario that are prospective for battery metals nickel, copper, cobalt.
Also in 2021, the company acquired the Ebby-Otto gold exploration property 5 km away from Kirkland Lake Gold's Macassa Mine in the Abitibi gold belt just south of Kirkland Lake, Ontario.
